About.title: About me
About.description: With over 15 years of experience in software development, I've built up a strong expertise in front-end engineering, specializing in React.
About.role: As a Lead Software Engineer, I'm involved in key technical decisions across design, architecture, and core component development. Beyond coding, I contribute to configuration management, continuous integration, and team support, while coaching and training team members.
About.collaborate: I am a committed, proactive, and results-oriented professional with a strong sense of responsibility and quality. I thrive in collaborative environments, learn quickly, and am always seeking new challenges and opportunities to continue growing.

Writing.title: I Write Stuff
Writing.description: I write about Software, Tech, Artificial Intelligence, Mentoring, Career Growth, Innovation and Opinions on different topics.

Podcast.title: Code Quests Podcast
Podcast.description: Code Quests, is a podcast featuring AI-narrated readings of my articles about software development, technology, and innovation. Join us as we explore the latest trends and insights in the tech world through engaging audio stories.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: As a vendor, I've had the opportunity to collaborate with these outstanding clients.
Experience.clientDescription1: Media company formed by the merger of WarnerMedia and Discovery, Inc., offering a vast array of entertainment content.
Experience.clientDescription2: Popular online job search platform, connecting job seekers with employers worldwide.
Experience.clientDescription3: A global leader in professional services, providing innovative solutions in auditing, consulting, and advisory services.
Experience.clientDescription4: Free ad-supported streaming television service owned and operated by the Paramount Streaming division of Paramount Global.

Company.title: Big News – I started a Company!
Company.description: Decided to start something of my own. It’s a new path, and I'm excited to share it!
Company.card1: I got tired of the usual 9-to-5 grind and thought, "Hey, why not shake things up?"
Company.card2: We work 30 hours a week because, let's face it, life's too short for endless meetings.
Company.card3: We're all about quick progress. You'll see updates daily – no waiting around for months!
Company.card4: We use some pretty nifty AI tools. It's like having a super-smart robot assistant!
Company.quote: "Quality, efficiency, and maybe having a bit of fun along the way. That's the goal!"

Riddler.question: What do I know about you
Riddler.disclaimer: This site does not store any information.

Footer.rights: Let's collaborate and bring your digital vision to life.
